summary: Product manager focused on internal platforms and developer productivity with 6+ years experience building scalable B2B systems.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Drove internal platform roadmap to accelerate developer iteration speed by 40%
Improved reliability through developer tooling and standards adoption across 15 engineering teams
Led cross-functional alignment on API design standards, reducing integration time by 60%
Owned billing platform migration serving 10M+ users with 99.9% uptime during transition

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Built observability platform from 0 to 1, enabling monitoring for distributed microservices
Managed B2B SaaS pricing strategy resulting in 150% ARR growth year-over-year
Collaborated with engineering leadership on technical debt reduction saving $2M annually
Established developer community engagement increasing SDK adoption by 200%

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
bullets: Supported platform infrastructure improvements for high-scale systems serving 50M+ requests/day
Conducted vendor evaluation and build vs buy analysis for internal tooling investments
Partnered with DevOps teams on engineering productivity initiatives reducing deployment time by 50%
